title: Fightercraft
summary: Fightercraft are the smallest ships in the game, very similar to Interceptors. Fighters are powerful in swarms or in the hands of a skilled pilot. In addition, sidegrades of fightercraft such as Hybrid ships offer different playstyles, but are harder to acquire. All players start with a Stratos fighter, which is automatically replaced if it is destroyed.
full_text:
Fightercraft are the smallest ships in the game, very similar to Interceptors. Fighters are powerful in swarms or in the hands of a skilled pilot. In addition, sidegrades of fightercraft such as Hybrid ships offer different playstyles, but are harder to acquire. All players start with a Stratos fighter, which is automatically replaced if it is destroyed.

content_structure.title: Fightercraft
content_structure.content:
Fightercraft are the smallest ships in the game, very similar to Interceptors. Fighters are powerful in swarms or in the hands of a skilled pilot. In addition, sidegrades of fightercraft such as Hybrid ships offer different playstyles, but are harder to acquire. All players start with a Stratos fighter, which is automatically replaced if it is destroyed.
